results.test: Should have at least 16 mood mappings (found 16)
Single happy mood should return happy label
Happy mood valence should be ~0.8
Happy mood arousal should be ~0.4
Calm+Excited valence should be moderate positive
Calm+Excited arousal should be near neutral
Calm+Excited should produce mixed or content mood
Sad+Anxious should have negative valence
Confidence should be in valid range
Weighted fusion should favor happy (higher weight)
Complex fusion should track all contributing moods
Positive mood combination should have high valence
Memory should have roomId
Memory should have mood vector valence
Memory should have mood vector arousal
Memory should have playlist tracks
Mood vector should be within valid range [-1, 1]
Fused mood confidence should be in range [0, 1]
High valence + arousal should generate energetic playlist
Energetic playlist should have high energy
Low valence + arousal should generate melancholic playlist
Melancholic playlist should have low energy
Low valence + high arousal should generate intense playlist
High valence + low arousal should generate peaceful playlist
Positive mood should use energetic color scheme
Negative low-arousal mood should use melancholic scheme
High arousal should use fast animation
Low arousal should use minimal animation
Positive mood combination should have positive valence
High-confidence inputs should produce confident result
Memory should track correct participant count
Memory should capture mood complexity
Similar vectors should have high similarity score
Replay should include playlist seeds
Visualizer intensity should be normalized
